item.description:
Team Random Greatness will be competing in at least four different team relays in 2012 and would love to have others from our group and other local meetup groups form their own teams to compete in these events along with us.

The Great Race, the Josh Billings, and Tully Lake are all three-segment team relay races - they have a paddle (lake kayak), peddle (road bike), and plod (road run) while the Greenway Challenge strings together 6 - 10 segments that include river/lake paddles, road/mountain peddles, or a road/trail plods.

  • The Great Race XXXV on August 12, 2012 in Auburn, NY. We will be competing in the traditional kayak race that consists of a 6.2 mile road run, a 19.5 mile road bike, and a 4.0 mile lake paddle. Click for more information about the great race.
  • The 36th Josh Billings RunAground on September 16, 2012 in Lenox, MA. We will be competing in the kayak race that consists of a 27.0 mile road bike, a 5.0 mile lake paddle, and a 6.2 mile run. Click for more information about the josh billings.
  • The 12th Blackstone River Valley Greenway Challenge on September 29, 2012 between Worcester, MA and Lincoln, RI. While the course (segments, distances, and route) won't be announced until next year (it changes every year), the 2011 course covered about 56 miles and had eight different segments: 5.5 mile run, 2.6 mile river kayak, 19.5 mile road bike, 6.0 mile run, 2.6 mile river kayak, 14.0 mile road bike, 3.1 mile trail run, and a 2.9 mile lake kayak. Click for more information about the greenway challenge.
  • The 6th Tully Lake Triathlon on October 13, 2012 in Royalston, MA. The race consists of a 5.0 mile lake paddle, a 4.5 mile trail run, and a 7.5 mile off-road bike. Click for more information about the tully lake.

Let me know if I can answer any questions or help you put a team together. If you would like to be part of a team indicate in your RSVP what part of the race you would like to do and maybe we can piece together a team or two.
item.name: The 36th Josh Billings RunAground Team Triathlon in Western MA
